jobs.title: AI Research Scientist
jobs.description: We're looking for an AI Research Scientist to join our team and help push the boundaries of what's possible with artificial intelligence.
responsibilities: Conduct cutting-edge research in machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing
Develop novel algorithms and models to solve complex problems
Collaborate with engineering teams to implement research findings into products
Publish research findings in top-tier conferences and journals
Stay current with the latest advancements in AI research
requirements: Ph.D. in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field
Strong publication record in top-tier AI conferences (NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, etc.)
Experience with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow)
Excellent programming skills in Python
Strong mathematical background in linear algebra, calculus, and statistics
preferred: Background in computer vision or natural language processing
Industry experience applying AI to real-world problems

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Join our engineering team to build beautiful, responsive, and intuitive user interfaces for our AI-powered products.
responsibilities: Design and implement user interfaces for web applications
Collaborate with designers, product managers, and backend engineers
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness
requirements: 5+ years of experience in frontend development
Proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
Experience with modern frontend frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular)
Understanding of responsive design principles
Knowledge of browser rendering behavior and performance

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description: We're seeking a Data Engineer to help build and maintain our data infrastructure, ensuring our AI systems have access to high-quality data.
responsibilities: Design, build, and maintain data pipelines
Develop ETL processes to extract data from various sources
Implement data quality checks and monitoring
Collaborate with data scientists and ML engineers
Optimize database performance and scalability
requirements: 3+ years of experience in data engineering
Proficiency in SQL and Python
Experience with data processing frameworks (Spark, Kafka)
Knowledge of database systems (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
Understanding of data modeling and warehousing concepts
preferred: Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Knowledge of containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
Familiarity with data governance and security best practices

jobs.title: Product Manager, AI Solutions
jobs.description: We're looking for a Product Manager to lead the development of our AI-powered solutions, translating customer needs into product features.
responsibilities: Define product vision, strategy, and roadmap
Gather and prioritize product requirements
Work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams
Analyze market trends and competitive landscape
Collect and analyze user feedback to inform product decisions
requirements: 4+ years of experience in product management
Experience with AI or SaaS products
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and presentation abilities
Ability to translate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
preferred: Technical background or experience in software development
Understanding of AI/ML concepts and applications
